examples.example: 哪怕只有一成的可能，我也会全力以赴去争取成功。

translate.english: Even if there is only a ten percent chance, I will go all out to strive for success.

examples.example: 尽管成功的概率只有一成，但我们仍要充满信心地去尝试。

translate.english: Although the probability of success is only one in ten, we still have to try with full confidence.
